text: Ani jevha karyaca nirnaya lavala ja'ila tevha saitana mhanela ki allahane tara tumhala satyavacana dile hote ani mi tumhala jo vayada dila, tyacyavirud'dha kele. Majha tumacyavara kahi jora tara navhataca. Ho, mi tumhala pukarale ani tumhi majhe mhanane man'ya kele. Ata tumhi majhyavara dosaropa thevu naka, ulata svatahcaca dhihkkara kara. Mi na tumaci madata karu sakato, na tumhi majhe garhane dura karu sakata. Mi tara (suruvatipasuna) manataca nahi ki tumhi mala yapurvi allahaca sahabhagi samajata rahile. Nihsansaya atyacari lokansathi duhkhadayaka azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe
